p: Despite a substantial body of frameworks to guide research, action and policy on health and climate change [ 17, 27, 28, 29, 30, 31, 32, 33, 34] there is little evidence about the effectiveness of interventions aimed at redressing their adverse interactions. Notwithstanding research priorities [ 35] and priority actions [ 36] for NCDs alone, there is even less evidence specifically about the interaction between NCDs and climate change.
